sections.text: 752.001 Definitions.—As used in this chapter, the term:

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Grandparent” shall include great-grandparent
sections.text: (2)“Missing” means having whereabouts which are unknown for a period of at least 90 days and not being able to be located after a diligent search and inquiry. Such search and inquiry for a missing person must include,
